General.Name: Galaxy Far East
General.Description: Macnica Galaxy Inc. distributes IC products and services in Taiwan and internationally. It offers software, artificial intelligence, and Internet of Things products, as well as semiconductor solutions to customers in the cloud, Internet of Things, communication, industrial electronics, and automotive industries. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan. Macnica Galaxy Inc. is a subsidiary of Macnica Chungju Co., Ltd.
General.Address: 207-5, Peihsin Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan
